itemDescription: Welsh sprint athlete, rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Berwyn Jones (13 February 1940 – 12 January 2007) was a Welsh sprint athlete, and rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Rhymney RFC, as a wing, i.e. number 11 or 14, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Great Britain, Other Nationalities and Commonwealth XIII, and at club level for Wakefield Trinity (Heritage № 690), Bradford Northern and St Helens, as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5.
